objects.specification: A smooth, seamless floor platform with a neutral gray matte finish, designed for durability and even support of classroom furniture. The surface has a slight bevel at the edges to transition cleanly to the walls and minimize tripping hazards. It features low reflectance to reduce glare under bright overhead lighting.

A low-pile, neutral-toned carpet with a subtle heather texture and dense, durable fibers suitable for high foot traffic. The carpet covers the main floor area, offering a soft underfoot feel while maintaining easy maintenance. Edges are neatly finished to prevent fraying and ensure long-term wear.

A standard interior classroom wall with smooth plaster finish painted in a light neutral tone. The surface is slightly textured to diffuse light evenly and minimize glare. Corners are sharp and squared, with a slight chamfer at the ceiling joint for a clean appearance.

A standard interior classroom wall with smooth plaster finish painted in a light neutral tone. The surface is slightly textured to diffuse light evenly and minimize glare. Corners are sharp and squared, with a slight chamfer at the ceiling joint for a clean appearance.

A standard interior classroom wall with smooth plaster finish painted in a light neutral tone. The surface is slightly textured to diffuse light evenly and minimize glare. Corners are sharp and squared, with a slight chamfer at the ceiling joint for a clean appearance.

A standard interior classroom wall with smooth plaster finish painted in a light neutral tone. The surface is slightly textured to diffuse light evenly and minimize glare. Corners are sharp and squared, with a slight chamfer at the ceiling joint for a clean appearance.

A flat ceiling panel with a smooth, matte white finish and a subtle acoustic texture to help diffuse sound. The ceiling has a uniform thickness and incorporates concealed mounting points for lighting fixtures, providing a clean, uncluttered look.

A small rectangular student desk with a light wood laminate top featuring rounded corners and a sleek metal frame. It includes a modesty panel beneath the work surface and slender tubular legs for a minimalist, modern design. The laminate finish is durable and easy to clean.

A standard student chair with a one-piece molded plastic seat and back in a muted complementary color, supported by powder-coated metal legs. The design is ergonomically curved to support posture and includes rubber feet to protect flooring.

A larger teacher desk with a dark wood veneer top and sturdy metal frame, featuring storage drawers on one side and a modesty panel. The design combines classic elegance with modern durability and offers ample workspace for teaching materials.

An adjustable swivel teacher chair with a padded seat and back upholstered in muted neutral fabric. It has a five-star metal base with casters for mobility and height adjustment, plus ergonomic lumbar support and curved armrests.

A large rectangular board with a smooth, writable surface in either matte blackboard finish or glossy whiteboard finish, framed by a slim aluminum border. The surface is optimized for clear chalk or marker visibility with minimal glare.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white housing and ventilation grilles. The lens assembly protrudes slightly at the front and the unit includes a swivel mount for precise aiming. The design is minimalist to blend with the ceiling.

A tall open bookshelf in medium wood finish with five evenly spaced shelves, each populated with a variety of book shapes. The unit has sturdy side panels and a thin back support, offering a modern library aesthetic.

A tall open bookshelf in medium wood finish with five evenly spaced shelves, each populated with a variety of book shapes. The unit has sturdy side panels and a thin back support, offering a modern library aesthetic.

An indoor potted plant in a cylindrical ceramic pot with a glossy white finish, containing multiple lush green stems and broad leaves with natural variegation. The foliage has a realistic texture and organic shape.

A standard rectangular window with a slim white-painted frame and clear glass pane. The window is dressed with soft fabric curtains that hang from a slender rod, featuring gentle folds and subtle tiebacks.

A standard rectangular window with a slim white-painted frame and clear glass pane. The window is dressed with soft fabric curtains that hang from a slender rod, featuring gentle folds and subtle tiebacks.

A standard rectangular window with a slim white-painted frame and clear glass pane. The window is dressed with soft fabric curtains that hang from a slender rod, featuring gentle folds and subtle tiebacks.

A round wall clock with a clean white dial, minimalist hour markers, and slender black hands. The outer frame is thin and neutral in tone, giving a modern, unobtrusive appearance suited to a classroom.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte metallic surface and open top. The simple form showcases smooth, rounded curves and a durable finish suitable for classroom disposal needs.

A slim LED ceiling light fixture with a frosted diffuser panel and flush mount design. The housing is a smooth matte white, providing bright, even illumination across the classroom space.
